vtklegend.cpp File Reference

add legend for a colormap More...

Detailed Description

add legend for a colormap

vtklegend([HANDLE], colorLUT, [title], [config, ...])

Parameters:
[in] HANDLE (optional) explicit VTK handle
[in] colorLUT color lookup table (see Color Lookup Tables)
[in] title (optional) alternative title string (default: "Values")
[in] config (optional) config structure (see Configuration parameters)
Displays a color bar at the left border of the window, labeled with the according values that are mapped to those colors. Text Formatting values are respected for the title string.
